import math

def solution():
    pass
T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    (A, B, M) = map(int, input().split())
    (cw, acw) = (0, 0)
    if A < B:
        cw = abs(A - B)
        acw = abs(B - M) + A
    else:
        cw = abs(M - A) + B
        acw = abs(A - B)
    print(min(cw, acw))
